entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:26 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -43.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 8:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -43.1°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -57
Dewpoint: -48.3°C
Wind: NNE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 44.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Ice fog patches. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 44. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 60 in the evening and minus 53 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
